txt.en: 'I don't know what I'm doing here or where I'm going.'
'This place is better than wandering the wilderness.'
'The fire here is nice and warm. Too bad the food isn't.'
'Why are you asking about me? Who sent you?'
'Some of these people...I don't trust them. They have a desperate look about them.'
'This place smells of old mushrooms and wet dog.'
'I had dreams when I was a wee one. How did I ever come to this sorry state?'
'There are things out there in the darkness. Things I'd best not mention by name.'
'Guard yourself, stranger. Foul things lurk in the darkness, and things aren't what they seem.'
'Another bedraggled traveller in from the cold? Well, pull up a chair and rest your bones a spell.'
